summary: A teenager is part of an interactive video game where he kills innocent victims. Later, the murders become real.
cast: Edward Furlong|Frank Langella|T. Ryder Smith|Amy Hargreaves|Jamie Marsh|Victor Ertmanis|David Hemblen|Vlasta Vrana|Domenico Fiore|Claire Riley|Tod Fennell|Michèle-Barbara Pelletier|Dean Hagopian|Donna Baccala|Jérôme Tiberghien|Don Jordan|Pete White|Peter Colvey|Paul Stewart|Richard Zeman|Zak|Jerry McGrath
title: Juego mortal
